ing: 1/3 cup chopped fresh basil, or more to taste
1/3 cup chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste
des: "A great homemade salad dressing for vegans, raw foodists, and vegetarians. Refrigerate any leftovers for the next salad. This is my first posting of the recipes I am creating as a new raw foodist. There's more to come. Goodness without guilt!"
ins: Whisk olive oil, vinegar, basil, cilantro, nutritional yeast, liquid aminos, salt, and pepper together in a bowl until smooth.
